inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic and severe AS defined by an effective AVA ≤1 cm² and indexed AVA ≤0.6 cm2/m2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function. EF was 25%. RV pressure was 41 and had biatrial enlargement.

inclusion.criterion: MAG <40 mm Hg (measure confirmed by the multi-window continuous-wave Doppler interrogation and use of Pedoff probe)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Confirmation of the presence of severe AS at DSE and MDCT aortic calcium score
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: repeat echo confirmed critical aortic stenosis showing left ventricular hypertrophy with cavity dilation and severe global hypokinesis

inclusion.criterion: Feasibility of AVR by surgery or TAVR according to the 'heart team'
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient having a life expectancy <1 year, independently from their aortic pathology
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Coronary artery disease necessitating a percutaneous or surgical revascularisation
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a concomitant valve disease needing surgical treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: LVEF is below the required threshold. Feasibility of AVR by surgery or TAVR according to the 'heart team' is unknown.
